message:
Stephen, have you an example of how to use AsyncContextThread?  
I'm upgrading some Topshelf hosted Windows services, which have some async methods they - now - call on startup. They're working fine when run with AsyncContext as console apps, but aren't starting properly as Windows services.  
I've looked at the AsyncContextThread class but can't figure out how I'm supposed to use it, sorry for being obtuse.  
Apologies if this is the wrong place to ask for clarification.
